Package org.dbasu.robomvvm.binding

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ValueConverter
    Converts between source and target values in a Binding
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Binding
    Allows binding of properties and actions between Components.
    DefaultValueConverter
    A value converter that performs no conversion.
    TypedValueConverter
    A value converter that attempts to convert between a source type and a target type.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BindMode
    Specifies the direction of a Binding.
